original_title: บางคนแคร์ แคร์บางคน
overview: A romantic comedy about a woman who specializes in breaking up a relationship on behalf of the involved parties. She doesn't believe in love, that’s why she is so good at her job. But then she experiences love at first sight, though the man she sees suddenly disappears. She sets out to look for him, with the help of a boy who lives next door.
title: At First Site
